title: Add meditation course and update course descriptions with duration details

requirements.summary: Display updated course descriptions with duration details on all frontend course views including public homepage, course list, and student dashboard
acceptanceCriteria: Course duration and daily class hours are visible in course cards
Updated descriptions appear on public homepage course highlights
Course details are shown in student dashboard available courses tab

file_operations.description: Update course highlight sections to display duration details (3 days/1 hour daily for Basic, 15 days/1+ hours daily for Advance, 1 month/1+ hours daily for Institution) in the course description text for each course card

Enhance course card display to show duration and daily class hours information prominently alongside existing course descriptions, ensuring the information is retrieved from backend course descriptions
Update enrolled course cards to display duration and daily class hours from course descriptions, maintaining consistent formatting with CourseList component
Ensure the Available Courses tab displays duration details by confirming CourseList component integration properly renders updated course information

requirements.summary: Assign a unique image for the new meditation course and display it consistently across all course views
acceptanceCriteria: Meditation course displays with its own distinctive image
Image appears in course list, student dashboard, and public homepage

file_operations.description: Add mapping for meditation course ID to the generated image at frontend/public/assets/generated/meditation-course.dim_800x600.png, ensuring the courseImages utility function returns this path when the meditation course is requested

Add a new course highlight section for the meditation course (18+ age group) with the meditation course image from frontend/public/assets/generated/meditation-course.dim_800x600.png, positioned alongside existing Basic, Advance, and Institution course highlights

Verify courseImages utility is used to fetch images for all courses including the new meditation course, ensuring frontend/public/assets/generated/meditation-course.dim_800x600.png displays correctly in the course grid

Ensure enrolled courses display uses courseImages utility to show the meditation course image frontend/public/assets/generated/meditation-course.dim_800x600.png when students are enrolled in the meditation course
